text: 10-minute podcast about how politicians really spend our money by endangering what makes the US special in the world economy. We are the #1 safe place to park wealth. But as we creep toward being Third World, we become less special. We can't base our political system on outright lies and still be the business, tech, science and education leaders. There will come a time when we are #2, and from there it's freefall.
